A Last Hurrah

Posted on Friday, April 06, 2007

Vermont and New Hampshire just got slammed with a big late season storm. Being an intrepid adventurer, I ventured to Killington with my partner-in-crime. The following ensued:

I got down on some box too... a little Backside Noseslide

Nucci ups the ante on the kink box
